title: Decrease in the Demand for Labor

content.question: Which of the following will cause a decrease in the demand for labor?

choices.label: A decrease in the price of the product that the labor is used to produce
Greater preference for leisure rather than work

content.answer: A decrease in the price of the product that the labor is used to produce

topic.text: 5.2: Changes in Factor Demand and Factor Supply

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
